cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on May 18, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2980, Cybersecurity Vulnerability Remediation Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 77 (Tuesday, May 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. JACKSON LEE:
H.R. 2980.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clauses 1, 3, 8, 10, 13,
17, and 18 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H2142]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: Cybersecurity Vulnerability Remediation Act
